## Packages

1.  Copy the following code and install the following packages in RStudio

```{r}
#| output: false

ipak <- 
  function(pkg){ 
    new.pkg <- 
      pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]
    if (length(new.pkg)) 
      install.packages(new.pkg, dependencies = TRUE)
    sapply(pkg, require, character.only = TRUE)}

# usage
packages <- 
  c(
    'renv',
    'rmarkdown',
    'rinat',
    'tidyverse', 
    'rgbif',
    'tmap',
    'sf',
    'terra')

ipak(packages)
```
